line.text: That thou art blamed shall not be thy defect
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For slander mark was ever yet the fair
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The ornament of beauty is suspect
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A crow that flies in heaven sweetest air
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So thou be good slander doth but approve
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy worth the greater being wooed of time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For canker vice the sweetest buds doth love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And thou present a pure unstained prime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou hast passed by the ambush of young days
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Either not assailed or victor being charged
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Yet this thy praise cannot be so thy praise
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To tie up envy evermore enlarged
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If some suspect of ill masked not thy show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then thou alone kingdoms of hearts shouldst owe
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
